title: Sonrai Data Connector
descriptionMarkdown: Use this data connector to integrate with Sonrai Security and get Sonrai tickets sent directly to Azure Sentinel.

sampleQueries.description: Query for tickets with AWSS3ObjectFingerprint resource type.

dataTypes.name: Sonrai_Tickets_CL
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery:
Sonrai_Tickets_CL
            | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated)
            | where isnotempty(Time)

value:
Sonrai_Tickets_CL
            | summarize LastLogReceived = max(TimeGenerated)
            | project IsConnected = LastLogReceived > ago(30d)

resourceProvider.permissionsDisplayText: read and write permissions are required.

read permissions to shared keys for the workspace are required. [See the documentation to learn more about workspace keys](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-monitor/platform/agent-windows#obtain-workspace-id-and-key).

instructionSteps.title: Sonrai Security Data Connector
instructionSteps.description:
1. Navigate to Sonrai Security dashboard.
2. On the bottom left panel, click on integrations.
3. Select Azure Sentinel from the list of available Integrations.
4. Fill in the form using the information provided below.
